TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit HashCode extends System.ValueType

summary.span: 将多个值的哈希代码合并为一个哈希代码。

span.span: Combines the hash code for multiple values into a single hash code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用 将多个值组合 (例如，将结构或类中的字段) 为单个哈希代码。You can use to combine multiple values (for example, fields on a structure or class) into a single hash code. 此结构的操作方法有以下两种：This structure operates in one of two ways: * 静态方法，这些方法接受一组最多8个要组合的值。Static methods that accept a set of up to eight values to combine. * 以流式处理方式操作的两个实例方法，一次接受一个值。Two instance methods that operate in a streaming fashion, accepting values one at a time. > [!WARNING] > 最佳做法是将哈希代码视为实现细节，因为实现可能会在程序集版本间发生变化。It is best-practice to consider hash codes as an implementation detail, as the implementation may change across assembly versions. 不要 以序列化的结构（例如，磁盘）存储生成的哈希代码。Do not store hash codes produced by in serialized structures, for example, on-disk. 使用静态初始化的随机种子来强制实施此最佳实践，这意味着哈希代码仅在操作系统进程范围内确定。 uses a statically initialized random seed to enforce this best practice, meaning that the hash codes are only deterministic within the scope of an operating system process. ### 静态方法Static Methods 静态方法将多达8个值的默认哈希代码组合在一起。The static methods combine the default hash codes of up to eight values. [!code-csharp[System.HashCode.Structure#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.hashcode.structure/cs/example1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.HashCode.Structure#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.hashcode.structure/vb/example1.vb#1)] ### 实例方法Instance Methods > [!IMPORTANT] > 对于每个实例，最多只能调用一次 。 must be called at most once per instance of . 实例方法将超过8个值的哈希代码组合在一起。The instance methods combine the hash codes of more than eight values. [!code-csharp[System.HashCode.Structure#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.hashcode.structure/cs/example2.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.HashCode.Structure#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.hashcode.structure/vb/example2.vb#1)] 实例方法还合并了特定实现所生成的哈希代码 。The instance methods also combine the hash codes produced by a specific implementation. [!code-csharp[System.HashCode.Structure#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.hashcode.structure/cs/example3.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.HashCode.Structure#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.hashcode.structure/vb/example3.vb#1)] 结构必须按引用传递给其他方法，因为它是值类型。The structure must be passed by-reference to other methods, as it is a value type. [!code-csharp[System.HashCode.Structure#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.hashcode.structure/cs/example4.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.HashCode.Structure#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.hashcode.structure/vb/example4.vb#1)]

summary.span: 传播由指定值返回的哈希代码。

span.span: Diffuses the hash code returned by the specified value.

returns.span: 表示单个值的哈希代码。

span.span: The hash code that represents the single value.

remarks.span: 某些数据结构假定哈希代码扩散到大范围。

span.span: Some data structures assume that hash codes are diffused across a large range.

remarks.span: 此方法可提高值返回的哈希代码的质量，在基础数据类型很简单（例如整数值）时，此方法非常有用。

span.span: This method improves the quality of the hash code returned by the value and is useful when the underlying data type is simple, for example, an integer value.
